lines.text: What do you think she meant when she said a huge black monster with giant claws?
I don't know, but I hope your mother-in-law has an alibi.
They were the ones who ended up being sampled.
I wanted him to be happy. I didn't know his intention.
Revenge on society. Innocent people had to be slaughtered.
I can't believe it. He is sick and so is society.
